para: Splits output into separate files for each waypoint by appending a decimal number to the output filename.

example.title: Example for splitoutput option to text format
example.para:
If "MyPQ.gpx" contains five waypoints,
gpsbabel -i gpx -f MyPocketQuery -o text,split -F blah
will result in files named blah1 ... blah5, each containing info from one of those waypoints.
